8513 -    def __generate_found_ids_match(self, branch_list, pkgkey, pkgname, pkgcat, caseSensitive, multiMatch): 

8514          foundIDs = set() 
8515          for idx in branch_list: 
8516   
8517              if pkgcat == "null": 
8518                  results = self.searchPackagesByName( 
8519                      pkgname, sensitive = caseSensitive, 
8520                      branch = idx, justid = True 
8521                  ) 
8522              else: 
8523                  results = self.searchPackagesByNameAndCategory( 
8524                      name = pkgname, category = pkgcat, branch = idx, 
8525                      sensitive = caseSensitive, justid = True 
8526                  ) 
8527   
8528              mypkgcat = pkgcat 
8529              mypkgname = pkgname 
8530              virtual = False 
8531              # if it's a PROVIDE, search with searchProvide 
8532              # there's no package with that name 
8533              if (not results) and (mypkgcat == "virtual"): 
8534                  virtuals = self.searchProvide(pkgkey, branch = idx, justid = True) 
8535                  if virtuals: 
8536                      virtual = True 
8537                      mypkgname = self.retrieveName(virtuals[0]) 
8538                      mypkgcat = self.retrieveCategory(virtuals[0]) 
8539                      results = virtuals 
8540   
8541              # now validate 
8542              if not results: 
8543                  continue # search into a stabler branch 
8544   
8545              elif (len(results) > 1): 
8546   
8547                  # if it's because category differs, it's a problem 
8548                  foundCat = None 
8549                  cats = set() 
8550                  for idpackage in results: 
8551                      cat = self.retrieveCategory(idpackage) 
8552                      cats.add(cat) 
8553                      if (cat == mypkgcat) or ((not virtual) and (mypkgcat == "virtual") and (cat == mypkgcat)): 
8554                          # in case of virtual packages only (that they're not stored as provide) 
8555                          foundCat = cat 
8556   
8557                  # if we found something at least... 
8558                  if (not foundCat) and (len(cats) == 1) and (mypkgcat in ("virtual", "null")): 
8559                      foundCat = sorted(cats)[0] 
8560   
8561                  if not foundCat: 
8562                      # got the issue 
8563                      continue 
8564   
8565                  # we can use foundCat 
8566                  mypkgcat = foundCat 
8567   
8568                  # we need to search using the category 
8569                  if (not multiMatch) and (pkgcat == "null" or virtual): 
8570                      # we searched by name, we need to search using category 
8571                      results = self.searchPackagesByNameAndCategory( 
8572                          name = mypkgname, category = mypkgcat, 
8573                          branch = idx, sensitive = caseSensitive, justid = True 
8574                      ) 
8575   
8576                  # validate again 
8577                  if not results: 
8578                      continue  # search into another branch 
8579   
8580                  # if we get here, we have found the needed IDs 
8581                  foundIDs |= set(results) 
8582                  break 
8583   
8584              else: 
8585   
8586                  idpackage = results[0] 
8587                  # if mypkgcat is virtual, we can force 
8588                  if (mypkgcat == "virtual") and (not virtual): 
8589                      # in case of virtual packages only (that they're not stored as provide) 
8590                      mypkgcat = self.retrieveCategory(idpackage) 
8591   
8592                  # check if category matches 
8593                  if mypkgcat != "null": 
8594                      foundCat = self.retrieveCategory(idpackage) 
8595                      if mypkgcat == foundCat: 
8596                          foundIDs.add(idpackage) 
8597                      continue 
8598                  foundIDs.add(idpackage) 
8599                  break 
8600   
8601          return foundIDs

8604 -    def __handle_found_ids_match(self, foundIDs, direction, matchTag, matchRevision, justname, strippedAtom, pkgversion): 

8605   
8606          dbpkginfo = set() 
8607          # now we have to handle direction 
8608          if ((direction) or ((not direction) and (not justname)) or ((not direction) and (not justname) and strippedAtom.endswith("*"))) and foundIDs: 
8609   
8610              if (not justname) and \ 
8611                  ((direction == "~") or (direction == "=") or \ 
8612                  (direction == '' and not justname) or (direction == '' and not justname and strippedAtom.endswith("*"))): 
8613                  # any revision within the version specified OR the specified version 
8614   
8615                  if (direction == '' and not justname): 
8616                      direction = "=" 
8617   
8618                  # remove gentoo revision (-r0 if none) 
8619                  if (direction == "="): 
8620                      if (pkgversion.split("-")[-1] == "r0"): 
8621                          pkgversion = self.entropyTools.remove_revision(pkgversion) 
8622                  if (direction == "~"): 
8623                      pkgrevision = self.entropyTools.dep_get_portage_revision(pkgversion) 
8624                      pkgversion = self.entropyTools.remove_revision(pkgversion) 
8625   
8626                  for idpackage in foundIDs: 
8627   
8628                      dbver = self.retrieveVersion(idpackage) 
8629                      if (direction == "~"): 
8630                          myrev = self.entropyTools.dep_get_portage_revision(dbver) 
8631                          myver = self.entropyTools.remove_revision(dbver) 
8632                          if myver == pkgversion and pkgrevision <= myrev: 
8633                              # found 
8634                              dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8635                      else: 
8636                          # media-libs/test-1.2* support 
8637                          if pkgversion[-1] == "*": 
8638                              if dbver.startswith(pkgversion[:-1]): 
8639                                  dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8640                          elif (matchRevision != None) and (pkgversion == dbver): 
8641                              dbrev = self.retrieveRevision(idpackage) 
8642                              if dbrev == matchRevision: 
8643                                  dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8644                          elif (pkgversion == dbver) and (matchRevision is None): 
8645                              dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8646   
8647              elif (direction.find(">") != -1) or (direction.find("<") != -1): 
8648   
8649                  if not justname: 
8650   
8651                      # remove revision (-r0 if none) 
8652                      if pkgversion.endswith("r0"): 
8653                          # remove 
8654                          self.entropyTools.remove_revision(pkgversion) 
8655   
8656                      for idpackage in foundIDs: 
8657   
8658                          revcmp = 0 
8659                          tagcmp = 0 
8660                          if matchRevision != None: 
8661                              dbrev = self.retrieveRevision(idpackage) 
8662                              revcmp = cmp(matchRevision, dbrev) 
8663                          if matchTag != None: 
8664                              dbtag = self.retrieveVersionTag(idpackage) 
8665                              tagcmp = cmp(matchTag, dbtag) 
8666                          dbver = self.retrieveVersion(idpackage) 
8667                          pkgcmp = self.entropyTools.compare_versions(pkgversion, dbver) 
8668                          if pkgcmp is None: 
8669                              import warnings 
8670                              warnings.warn("WARNING, invalid version string stored in %s: %s <-> %s" % (self.dbname, pkgversion, dbver,)) 
8671                              continue 
8672                          if direction == ">": 
8673                              if pkgcmp < 0: 
8674                                  dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8675                              elif (matchRevision != None) and pkgcmp <= 0 and revcmp < 0: 
8676                                  dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8677                              elif (matchTag != None) and tagcmp < 0: 
8678                                  dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8679                          elif direction == "<": 
8680                              if pkgcmp > 0: 
8681                                  dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8682                              elif (matchRevision != None) and pkgcmp >= 0 and revcmp > 0: 
8683                                  dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8684                              elif (matchTag != None) and tagcmp > 0: 
8685                                  dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8686                          elif direction == ">=": 
8687                              if (matchRevision != None) and pkgcmp <= 0: 
8688                                  if pkgcmp == 0: 
8689                                      if revcmp <= 0: 
8690                                          dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8691                                  else: 
8692                                      dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8693                              elif pkgcmp <= 0 and matchRevision is None: 
8694                                  dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8695                              elif (matchTag != None) and tagcmp <= 0: 
8696                                  dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8697                          elif direction == "<=": 
8698                              if (matchRevision != None) and pkgcmp >= 0: 
8699                                  if pkgcmp == 0: 
8700                                      if revcmp >= 0: 
8701                                          dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8702                                  else: 
8703                                      dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8704                              elif pkgcmp >= 0 and matchRevision is None: 
8705                                  dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8706                              elif (matchTag != None) and tagcmp >= 0: 
8707                                  dbpkginfo.add((idpackage, dbver)) 
8708   
8709          else: # just the key 
8710   
8711              dbpkginfo = set([(x, self.retrieveVersion(x),) for x in foundIDs]) 
8712   
8713          return dbpkginfo
